---
title: "q29 'What percentage of disability are you rated, as indicated by the Veteran's Affairs (VA)?'"
author: "David Ritter"
date: "2/18/2020"
output: html_document
---

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(stringr)
source("helper.R")
```

```{r}
raw_data_general <- read.csv("data/master.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
```

```{r}
q <- "What.percentage.of.disability.are.you.rated..as.is.indicated.by.the.Veteran.s.Affairs..VA.."
q_data <- get_single_selection_0(data = raw_data_general, q.name = q)
q_n <- length(unique(q_data$id))
```

```{r}
histogram_object <- hist(as.numeric(q_data$response))
histogram_object$breaks
histogram_object$counts
plot(histogram_object)
```

```{r}
ggsave(plot(histogram_object), file = "q29_disability.png")
```

```{r}
write.csv(q_data, 'q29_disability_144.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
qf_data <- q_data %>%
  filter(response == "Response text")
```

```{r}
qf_all_data <- 
  qf_data %>%
  inner_join(q_data, by = "id")

qf_n <- length(unique(qf_all_data$id))
```

```{r}
q_plot <- clean_single_select_f(qf_all_data)
r <- plot_single_select_f(q_plot)
r
```

```{r}
ggsave(filename = 'q29_disability.png', plot = r, device = 'png')
write.csv(q_plot, 'q29_disability_n#.csv', row.names = FALSE)
```
